METS_Profile.title: E-ARK 3D PM root METS Profile 1.0 (cits3dhm_v1_0)
METS_Profile.abstract: This is the profile for a root METS following E-ARK 3D HM. It's an extension of the E-ARK CSIP profile.

resource_model.head: E-ARK 3DHM ROOT profile
resource_model.p: This profile together with the E-ARK CITS 3DHM specification document describes the root METS document for an IP conforming to the E-ARK CITS 3D HM.

external_schema.name: E-ARK SIP METS Extension
external_schema.context: XML-schema for the attributes added by SIP

note.p: An extension schema with the added attributes for use in this profile.
The schema is used with a namespace prefix of sip.

external_schema.name: E-ARK CSIP METS Extension
external_schema.context: XML-schema for the attributes added by CSIP

note.p: An extension schema with the added attributes for use in this profile.
The schema is identified using the namespace prefix csip.

description_rules.p: The filepath must be decoded consistently throughout all file references within the information package.

description.p: Describes the type of the alternative record ID.
Describes the type of the alternative record ID.
Describes the type of a note for an agent.
Describes the type of the alternative record ID.
Lists the names of specific E-ARK content information type specifications supported or maintained in this METS profile.
Declares the categorical classification of package content.
Describes the uses of the file group `<fileGrp>` that are supported by the profile.
Own names should be placed in an own extending vocabulary.

vocabulary.name: Content category and folder definitions in 3DHM
vocabulary.context: Predefined values for content category and documentation types

description.p: Describes the extra terms supported by this profile.
Own names should be placed in an own extending vocabulary.
Describes the status of the descriptive metadata section (dmdSec) which is supported by the profile.
Valid values for the mime types of referenced files.
Describes the type of the structural map `<structMap>` that is supported by the profile.
Own types should be placed in an own extending vocabulary.
Describes the label of the structural map that is supported by the profile.
Own labels should be placed in an own extending vocabulary.

description.head: METS Profile
description.p: The value is set to "https://cits3dhm.dilcis.eu/profile/E-ARK-3dhm-ROOT-v1-0-0.xml".

description.head: Content Category
description.p: The `mets/@TYPE` attribute is set to the value "OTHER".

description.head: Other Content Category
description.p: The `mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE` attribute is set to the value "3D Heritage Model Data".

description.head: Content Information Type Specification
description.p: The `mets/@csip:CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE` attribute is set to the value "cits3dhm_v1_0"

description.head: METS header element
description.p: The METS header element SHOULD comply with the

description.head: Descriptive metadata
description.p: The 3D PM root METS document dmdSec element SHOULD comply withdmdSec requirements in the CSIP profile

description.head: Administrative metadata
description.p: The 3DHM root METS document amdSec element SHOULD comply with amdSec requirements in the CSIP profile.

description.head: File section
description.p: The transferred content is placed in representation folders described by representation METS documents referenced from the ROOT METS file section.
Only a single file section (`<fileSec>`) element MUST be present.

description.head: Paradata Documentation file group
description.p: All Paradata Documentation located in the documentation/paradata folder is placed in one or more file group elements with mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE attribute value ‘Paradata Documentation’ taken from the vocabulary.

description.head: Authentication Documentation file group
description.p: All Authentication Documentation located in the documentation/authentication folder is placed in one or more file group elements with mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE attribute value ‘Authentication Documentation’ taken from the vocabulary.

description.head: Other Documentation file group
description.p: All Other Documentation located in the documentation/other folder is placed in one or more file group elements with mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE attribute value ‘Other Documentation’ taken from the vocabulary.

description.head: Reference to administrative metadata
description.p: If administrative metadata has been provided at file group 'mets/fileSec/fileGrp/' level this attribute MUST refer to its administrative metadata section by ID.
For example if there are rights and/or digital provenance metadata that are general to the package.

description.head: Content Information Type Specification
description.p: The value of the attribute `mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@csip:CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE` is set to "cits3dhm_v1_0".

description.head: Paradata Documentation division
description.p: Paradata documentation referenced in the file section is described in the structural map with three sub-divisions

description.head: Paradata Documentation division identifier
description.p: Mandatory, xml:id identifier must be unique within the package

description.head: Paradata Documentation division label
description.p: The Paradata documentation division <div> element uses the value Paradata Documentation from the vocabuulary as the value for the @LABEL attribute

requirement.p: File groups containing Paradata Documentation are referenced via relevant file group identifiers.

description.head: Paradata Documentation file group reference pointer

requirement.p: A reference by ID, to Paradata Documentation file groups,

description.head: Authentication Documentation division
description.p: Authentication documentation referenced in the file section is described in the structural map with three sub-divisions

description.head: Authentication Documentation division identifier
description.p: Mandatory, xml:id identifier must be unique within the package

description.head: Authentication documentation division label
description.p: The Authentication documentation division <div> element uses the value Authentication Documentation from the vocabuulary as the value for the @LABEL attribute

requirement.p: File groups containing Authentication Documentation are referenced via relevant file group identifier.

description.head: Authentication Documentation file group reference pointer

requirement.p: A reference by ID, to Authentication Documentation file groups,

description.head: Other Documentation division
description.p: Other documentation referenced in the file section is described in the structural map with three sub-divisions

description.head: Other Documentation division identifier
description.p: Mandatory, xml:id identifier must be unique within the package

description.head: Other documentation division label
description.p: The Other documentation division <div> element uses the value Other Documentation from the vocabuulary as the value for the @LABEL attribute

requirement.p: File groups containing Other Documentation are referenced via relevant file group identifier.

description.head: Authentication Documentation file group reference pointer

requirement.p: A reference by ID, to Other Documentation file groups,

description.head: Representation division
description.p: There must be a discrete div element for each representation of the Product Model.

description.head: structLink
description.p: Section not defined or used in CSIP, additional own uses may occur.
Information regarding the structural links is found in the METS Primer

description.head: behaviorSec
description.p: Section not defined or used in CSIP, additional own uses may occur.
Information regarding the behavior section is found in the METS Primer
Requirements not stated in CITS 3D HM
